name: Storyfold: Wildwoods
description:
Storyfold: Wildwoods is an innovative solo & narrative adventure board game with beautiful art and an immersive story campaign.

Storyfold: Wildwoods is a narrative adventure game in which you play as a young girl named Luma, and her bear companion, Brom, as they set out to heal the forest from a dark and mysterious shadow.

In Storyfold: Wildwoods, you will use the innovative Storybook with its built in dashboard to progress in a replayable campaign. Each session of Wildwoods is a single scene, with multiple scenes forming a chapter. The choices you make will impact Luma’s journey across the chapters as she confronts her fears.

—description from the publisher
